archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.3.1: Ownership of critical business environments, processes, and applications (including supporting technical infrastructure) should be assigned to individuals (e.g. business managers), acknowledged and documented.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
